gate.event
Interface CreoleListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
CreoleRegister
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConditionalSerialAnalyserController, ConditionalSerialController, CorpusImpl, CreoleRegisterImpl, DocumentImpl, LuceneDataStoreImpl, MainFrame, MainFrame.ToolsMenu, NameBearerHandle, OntologyClassView, ParameterDisjunction, RealtimeCorpusController, ResourceParametersEditor, SerialAnalyserController, SerialController, SerialControllerEditor, SerialCorpusImpl
public interface CreoleListener
extends EventListener

A listener for events fired by the CreoleRegister (CreoleEvent). In a Gate system there are many classes that can fire CreoleEvents but all this events are collected and fired back by the CreoleRegister that can be obtained with a call to Gate.getCreoleRegister()
